name: kill-the-newsletter
description: Convert email newsletters into Atom feeds
author: Leandro Facchinetti <kill-the-newsletter@leafac.com> (https://leafac.com)

scripts.postinstall: (cd ./server/ && npm install && cd ..) && (cd ./static/ && npm install && cd ..)
scripts.prepare: (cd ./server/ && npm run prepare && cd ..) && (cd ./static/ && npm run prepare && cd ..)
scripts.start:clean:data: npm run clean:data && npm run start
scripts.test: prettier --check "./server/**/*.mts" --check "./static/prepare.mjs" --check "./configuration/**/*.mjs" --end-of-line auto && npm run prepare && cross-env TEST=kill-the-newsletter node ./build/server/index.mjs
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:data && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.update: npm-check-updates --upgrade && (cd ./server/ && npm-check-updates --upgrade && cd ..) && (cd ./static/ && npm-check-updates --upgrade && cd ..) && npm install
